name: Balance The Clans
description:
In Balance The Clans You play as a King that needs to manage conflicted Clans and lead his land to victory

When you place a building on a Clan territory or call their Hero, you gain their trust, but you lose trust of other Clans.

If a Clan trust drops to zero, you will lose the war, so chose your action wisely.

Game was made for Juice Jam II 2023
With a theme of : Paying The Price
